biography:
Laura Dianne Vandervoort (born September 22, 1984) is a Canadian actress known for her roles as Kara Zor-El (Supergirl) in the television series Smallville, Sadie Harrison in the television series Instant Star, and Lisa in the television series V.

name: Laura Vandervoort
